perturbation.original_text: B. Payment Terms. Wade Product Royalties described above in Section 8A will be paid on a quarterly basis on the first day of each of the months of July, October, January, and April and shall be accompanied by backup documentation reasonably satisfactory to Wade.
perturbation.changed_text: B. Payment Terms. Wade Product Royalties described above in Section 8A will be paid on a quarterly basis on the first day of each of the months of July, October, January, and April. Wade Product Royalties described above in Section 8A will be paid on a quarterly basis on the fifteenth day of each of the months of July, October, January, and April and shall be accompanied by backup documentation reasonably satisfactory to Wade.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates a contradiction in the payment terms. The original text states royalties are paid on the first day of the specified months, but the modification also states they are paid on the fifteenth day of the same months. This introduces ambiguity and uncertainty about when payment is actually due.

perturbation.original_text: A. Naked shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to Wade in the event Wade fails to perform the Wade Services or breaches any other covenant or agreement set forth herein (including the essence of this Agreement), and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. Such termination shall relieve Naked of its obligation to provide any further consideration pursuant to this Agreement provided that Wade shall retain all warrants he has received hereunder that have vested as of the date of such termination. In the event of such termination as a result of a material breach of this Agreement by Wade (i) Wade's contractual liabilities and obligations until the date of termination still exist notwithstanding such termination, (ii)  Naked shall be under no obligation to sell any Wade Products but shall nevertheless owe the Royalty on any Wade Products sold; and (iii) notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, Wade shall forfeit all warrants he has received hereunder. Naked shall not have waived any of its rights at law or in equity by exercising any provision of this section.
perturbation.changed_text: A. Naked shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days prior written notice to Wade in the event Wade fails to perform the Wade Services or breaches any other covenant or agreement set forth herein (including the essence of this Agreement), and fails to cure same (if curable) within seven (7) days of receipt of written notice. Such termination shall relieve Naked of its obligation to provide any further consideration pursuant to this Agreement provided that Wade shall retain all warrants he has received hereunder that have vested as of the date of such termination. In the event of such termination as a result of a material breach of this Agreement by Wade (i) Wade's contractual liabilities and obligations until the date of termination still exist notwithstanding such termination, (ii)  Naked shall be under no obligation to sell any Wade Products but shall nevertheless owe the Royalty on any Wade Products sold; and (iii) notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, Wade shall retain all warrants he has received hereunder. Naked shall not have waived any of its rights at law or in equity by exercising any provision of this section.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states that Wade forfeits all warrants upon termination due to a material breach. The modified clause states that Wade retains all warrants even in the event of termination due to material breach. This creates a direct contradiction regarding the disposition of the warrants upon termination, causing uncertainty about whether Wade loses or keeps them, and creating a financial incentive for Wade to argue for retaining the warrants.

perturbation.original_text: All rights to the use of the names, trademarks, service marks, symbols, logos, domain names, trade secrets, confidential know-how, patents, copyrights, any pending applications with respect to any of the foregoing, and  any other intellectual property and related proprietary rights, interests and protections ("Intellectual Property Rights") in connection with Wade Products will be jointly owned by Wade and Naked. Wade will retain all ownership of the Intellectual Property Rights in connection with Wade Image including, for the avoidance of doubt, the Logo. For the avoidance of doubt, no rights are being granted hereunder to any intellectual property belonging to the NBA or its member clubs (including but not limited to the Miami Heat).
perturbation.changed_text: All rights to the use of the names, trademarks, service marks, symbols, logos, domain names, trade secrets, confidential know-how, patents, copyrights, any pending applications with respect to any of the foregoing, and  any other intellectual property and related proprietary rights, interests and protections ("Intellectual Property Rights") in connection with Wade Products will be jointly owned by Wade and Naked. Wade will retain all ownership of the Intellectual Property Rights in connection with Wade Image excluding the Logo, which will be solely owned by Naked. For the avoidance of doubt, no rights are being granted hereunder to any intellectual property belonging to the NBA or its member clubs (including but not limited to the Miami Heat).
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that Wade retains all ownership of the Intellectual Property Rights in connection with Wade Image including, for the avoidance of doubt, the Logo. The modified text says the logo will be solely owned by Naked. This creates a contradiction on who owns the logo, causing uncertainty about who has the right to use, license, or control the Logo.
